dialogue.text: The question used to isolate me. Now it connects me to everyone who's ever wondered what they are.

visual_elements.varied_humans: Mother, cashier, elderly man - all carrying mystery
visual_elements.moment_recognition: Brief eye contact with existential acknowledgment
visual_elements.parking_lot: Suburban space transformed to sacred ground

psychological_notes: Complete reversal from isolation to connection. Evan now sees the question alive in everyone, creating instant kinship with all humanity. The very uncertainty that once separated him now serves as bridge. He recognizes existential questioning in ordinary moments.
philosophical_underpinning: The question 'What am I?' is humanity's shared inheritance across all time
therapeutic_direction: Finding belonging through shared uncertainty rather than false certainty
